The creative way to get things done.
A dot journal is the hottest new trend that combines a planner, to-do list, diary and so much more. All you need is a notebook, pen and some imagination! Find out how to get started. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/dotted-journal.aspx?cmp=EBJOURNALING19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Learn More <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/dotted-journal.aspx?cmp=EBJOURNALING19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Plan it Log it!
